paper_abstract: A toroidal grid graph C(m) square C(n) is the Cartesian product of two cycles. We prove chi(g)(TG) = col(g)(TG) = 5 for the family of toroidal grids TG. Moreover, we prove chi(g)(C(2m) square C(n)) = 5 for m >= 3 and n >= 7. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Game chromatic number of toroidal grids
